name: 2022 3rd International Symposium on Water, Ecology and Environment
content: 2022 3rd International Symposium on Water, Ecology and Environment (ISWEE 2022) Time: December 2-4, 2022 Venue: Beijing Jiaotong University, Beijing, China (Virtual) Conference website: https://www.iswee-conf.com/ Indexing: Scopus, EI Compendex, CPCI Organized by Beijing Jiaotong University, 2022 3rd International Symposium on Water, Ecology and Environment (ISWEE 2022) will be held online during December 2-4, 2022\. It will bring together academicians, scientists, engineers and technologists from all over the world to present their latest findings, opinions and views and discuss the latest thinking in the field of water resources, ecology and environment. The program will include keynote speeches, invited speeches, oral presentations and poster session. It is with great pleasure that we invite you to attend this symposium. Highlights 1\. Conference proceedings will be indexed by Scopus, EI Compendex, Inspec, CPCI (Thomson Reuters, WoS), and etc; 2\. Select papers will be recommended for publication in SCI/ISI journals with impact factors; 3\. Winner of the best presentation will be awarded with a free registration for the next conference. For more details, please contact the organizing committee for details. Emailï¼šiswee@confiswee.com Tel: +86 15527160416 Website: https://www.iswee-conf.com/
